about_the_game:
To your soul
Color the lost world.
One day, the world suddenly disappeared.

It has been eroded by the achromatic darkness. The story of a soul begins as they venture out to retrieve this lost color.

The main character, Fade, embarks on a road in search of a color that has suddenly disappeared. Passing through five colorful regions, the main character must find five souls that symbolize the missing colors. But the journey is never easy. Each region is filled with their own unique monsters and bosses, and an increasingly powerful challenge awaits you.



Your choice doesn't just stop at reclaiming the color. Before you embark on a faraway journey, you have to choose between two of your five weapons. This choice will be the first step on your journey. And the fate of the protagonist and the ending of the story will depend on that choice.

name: SoulWander

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 747 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

short_description: Soul Wander is a moving journey to restore lost colors and light to a dark world. Can you find the light in this darkness? Each region has its own story. Grow stronger with weapons and soul powers. Your choices shape the world’s fate. Begin your quest to reclaim lost colors now!
